attributes.action: Parents forcing their children into forced marriages must pay for their rescue.
attributes.background: The forced marriage act came into force in 2007 (1.) Since then the forced marriage unit has rescued many vulnerable young people from forced marriage. It is an expensive process, burdening the taxpayer. Those who do this should foot the bill as part of the criminal process as a further deterrent.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
